------=_NextPart_000_0167_01C044E2.2E9CCEA0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Clash laughs. He flies up and then lands in front of the 3. Clash could fly=
, they could not. Clash accidentally set a single tree on fire, to where he=
 laughed. Technosis sprayed it with an ice gun that managed to put out the =
flames.

Technosis: We have to go, I have an old friend to rescue.

Clash: =
Oh, really? I'll rescue your old friend. But not before I rescue YOU.

Psue=
do: I'm tired of this! Prepare for the void!

Psuedo fires a missiles direc=
tly into Clash, but it didn't do as much damage as Psuedo did with the miss=
ile on bots like Diskus. Clash swung his blades and chopped his rifle up. C=
lash slashes Psuedo and down he goes. Atma goes in and urges the others to =
be careful. Atma concentrates and throws Ultima. A huge explosion occurs. E=
veryone is damaged, but they were not the targets, the one who was aimed at=
 was Clash. Clash is laying of the ground, looking extremely angry, and was=
 not that hurt. Psuedo groaned.

Psuedo: Atma, you just hurt us!

Atma: Shu=
t up, I tried my best, and it failed! Happy?

Clash: I'm happy.

Clash stan=
ds up without his hands touching the ground. Atma fires a gun that a spark =
flies from, that just disappears, making Clash laugh, but then a surprise b=
omb rolled by Clash's feet. They cover their heads. BAM! Dust clears. Clash=
's mech fluid is on the ground. Clash stands up again.

Clash: That one hur=
t ALOT, but I still stand...
